body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Hill Motors. My name is Raymond Hill. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Crystal Wood.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Crystal. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's seven eight zero, two three four, five six nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Can you also share your home address with me for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's four two five, Maple Avenue, Apartment one zero zero two, Pleasantville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Crystal. We'll look into the pricing issue you've raised and get back to you soon.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Crystal. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
